data.name: Heavyarms Assemble: WWII
data.detailed_description:
If you are interested in this game, please add it to your wish list.


Majestic War Scene

The game shows players a highly realistic and magnificent war scene. The commander directs navy, army, and air force troops to launch a real battle with the enemy regiments. Each battle supports thousands of units to fight on the same screen, with hundreds of weapons for you to choose .


Establish Decrees

Formulate appropriate force regulations, flexibly deploy human resource relationships, maintain the motivation and satisfaction of the army, earn the reputation of civilians in every victory, and let your army go to victory under your wise leadership.


Training The Army

Training, providing logistics support, building camps, arranging defense, various restrictions and hinder are the key to determine the victory or defeat of the battle. You must weigh the pros and cons and make a careful choice to strike a balance between various factors.


Social And Relationships

As a commander of the army, you need to maintain a good relationship and coordination with your colleagues, and also need to deal with your superior and subordinate relations so that everyone can work together. Every soldier has his own personality. Dealing with the relationship with every soldier will be one of the key factors for your success or failure.


Be Careful Your Choice

You should consider each decision you make, because seemingly insignificant decisions may have a great impact on you. Subordinates trust you and they are willing to devote their life. As their leader, you bear heavy responsibility and all your choices are significant.


Develop New Technology

Compared with manpower and resources, war is a contest of science and technology. While developing your own army, you should also look further, look into the future, invest in the development of new technology, and put more sophisticated weapons into the battlefield to help you win.


Vast Map

North Africa, Middle Myanmar, Europe... Famous battlefields. As the commander of the army, the player needs to collect materials, deploy troops, strategic bombing, deploy defense, and siege and loot on the vast and complex map. You will write your own epic war with your army together.

data.short_description: This is a war survival game &RTS game with the theme of World War II. As a battlefield commander, maintaining your army's motivation and satisfaction, promoting your generals, managing your own economy, and dealing with your friends' armies, What kind of commander will you become in the process?
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10(64-Bit)
  • Processor: AMD A10 7850K or Intel i3-2000
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Geforce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10(64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-9400F 2.9GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics, GTX 1660 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card: DirectX compatible
